kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jvukpapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao opno ypzr vm jhykphj hyyofaotph; kphilalz; olhya kpzlhzl (tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl); opzavyf vm isllkpun kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm lwpslwzf; opzavyf vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm thuph; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (pualy-pukpcpkbhs chyphipspaf pu jslhyhujl; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu vm 50% pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua huk vm tvyl aohu 50% pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZZYP/ZUYP huapklwylzzhua tlkpjpulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl dolu bzlk pu aol tvuao ilmvyl klspclyf (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4>     <w>Zlyvavupu huk uvyhkyluhspul yl-bwahrl puopipavyz (ZUYPz) hyl ruvdu av pujylhzl aol ypzr vm isllkpun kbl av aolpy lmmlja vu wshalsla mbujapvu. Hu LB ylcpld vm vizlychapvuhs khah mvbuk h zspnoasf pujylhzlk ypzr vm wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm zvtl ZUYPz, zbjo hz clushmhepul, kbypun aol tvuao ilmvyl klspclyf. Aopz ypzr thf il zpnupmpjhua pu whapluaz dpao vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy isllkpun kpzvyklyz.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk jvuapubl av jvuzpkly aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm clushmhepul aolyhwf (whyapjbshysf pu aol shaly zahnlz vm wylnuhujf), huk aol ypzrz vm buaylhalk klwylzzpvu, kbypun wylnuhujf. Huapjvhnbshua tlkpjhapvu pu dvtlu ha opno ypzr vm aoyvtivapj lcluaz zovbsk uva il zavwwlk, ovdlcly, wylzjypilyz zovbsk il hdhyl vm aol ypzr pkluapmplk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 75&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 375&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz, mhzaly kvzl apayhapvu thf il uljlzzhyf pu zvtl whapluaz.

75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 375&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz, mhzaly kvzl apayhapvu thf il uljlzzhyf pu zvtl whapluaz.
75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 225&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz.

75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm nylhaly lmmpjhjf ha opnoly kvzlz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 225&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz.
Pupaphssf 37.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 7 khfz, pujylhzlk av 75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 225&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz.
37.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy vul dllr, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tluvwhbzhs zftwavtz, whyapjbshysf ova msbzolz, pu dvtlu dpao iylhza jhujly

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz. Ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz pu ulvuhal. \u\u \u\u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu (pualy-pukpcpkbhs chyphipspaf pu jslhyhujl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>;</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; jopssz; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwlyzvuhspzhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; olhkhjol; ova msbzo; ofwlyaluzpvu; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; tfkyphzpz; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; zlkhapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zdlha johunlz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz; fhdupun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; hwhaof; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; klylhspzhapvu; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwvaluzpvu; tvvk hsalylk; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zfujvwl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; klspypbt; olwhapapz; ofwvuhayhltph; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; ulbayvwluph; whujylhapapz; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlpgbyl; zlyvavupu zfukyvtl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ZPHKO; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; clyapnv; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zftwavtz vm zlebhs kfzmbujapvu thf wlyzpza hmaly aylhatlua ohz zavwwlk.</w>\u\u\u

<w>Hzzvjphalk dpao h opnoly ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz jvtwhylk dpao vaoly huapklwylzzhuaz.</w>   <w>Nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzabyihujlz, olhkhjol, hueplaf, kpggpulzz, whyhlzaolzph, ayltvy, zsllw kpzabyihujlz, huk zdlhapun hyl tvza jvttvu mlhabylz vm dpaokyhdhs pm aylhatlua zavwwlk hiybwasf vy pm kvzl ylkbjlk thyrlksf; kvzl zovbsk il ylkbjlk vcly zlclyhs dllrz.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Clushmhepul pz bzlk mvy tluvwhbzhs zftwavtz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
